name: Slendrina The Cellar VR
description:
Disclaimer: This is a fan project and is not affliated with DVloper.

Slendrina The Cellar VR is an Oculus Quest 1/2 VR game where you have to collect 8 books and escape from the cellar that Slendrina has you trapped in. You have to also hide from her and look away if she is near.
